explains: v. 颤抖（quiver 的现在分词）

sentences.cn: 库珀到了，气得浑身发抖。

sentences.en: The lady walked over to the boy again, who was still quivering with fear.
sentences.cn: 那位女士又走到男孩身边，男孩仍然害怕得发抖。

sentences.en: Mole stood a moment rigid, while his uplifted nose, quivering slightly, felt the air.
sentences.cn: 莫尔僵硬地站了一会儿，他翘起的鼻子微微颤动着，感觉着空气。
